text:
sami#taq(gm)q sa~gka#lpEthAq(gm)q saMpri#yau rOciqShNU su#manaqsyamA#nau | 
iShaqmUrja#maqBi saqM~MvasA#nauq saM ~MvAqM manA(gm)#siq saM ~MvraqtA samu# ciqttAnyA&ka#raM || 
agnE# purIShyAdhiqpA Ba#vAq tvaM na#H | 
iShaqmUrjaqM ~Myaja#mAnAya dhEhi || 
puqrIqShya#stvama#gnE rayiqmAn pu#ShTiqmA(gm) a#si | 
SiqvAH kRuqtvA diSaqH sarvAqH svAM ~MyOni#miqhA&sa#daH || 
Bava#taM naqH sama#nasauq samO#kasA - [  ] 18
